level.heading: PUBLIC INSPECTION OF AGREEMENTS (ยง 15-2621) Pursuant to 47 U.S.C. ยง 252(h), the Commission shall make a copy of eachegotiated, mediated, or arbitrated agreement approved under this Chaptervailable for public inspection and copying within ten (10) days afterommission approval of the agreement.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000)EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8315 (October 20,000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
